text: Dan Hardy, born May 17 1982 is an English former mixed martial artist who fought in the welterweight division. A black belt in taekwondo and a brown belt in Brazilian jiu-jitsu, he is currently competing in the welterweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship. He trains at Team Rough House in England with Paul Daley and Ross Pearson among others. In March 2010, he faced Georges St-Pierre in a title fight, which he lost by unanimous decision. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:British mixed martial artists
title: Dan Hardy
